import React from 'react'; import { useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; const EditUser = () => { const { id } = useParams(); const users = useSelector((state) => state); const currentUser = users.find((user) => user.id === id); return (

); }; export default EditUser;
